ygData.subject: Re: Verant Email text
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Sounds good, just add my little comment about the Skull of Jhen Tra. Wizard look stupid in those robes anyway, so at least let us have a cool skull in our
ygData.messageBody:
Ken Morrison wrote:

> Ok guys and girls, I took the liberty of doing some editing to
> Silverion's text as well as adding some of the other's comments, and
> my own =)

Sounds good, just add my little comment about the Skull of Jhen'Tra.
Wizard look stupid in those robes anyway, so at least let us have a cool
skull in our hand to impress our big weapon, shiny armor wielding
friends. It's not like there aren't any skulls in the game. I mean,
there are dozens of different undead skeleton types. But still we are
screwed over. When I hold the skull now, it looks like I have a lump on
my wrist. They just use the usual bag placeholder object, but a little
enlarged.

This is downright embarrassing, folks. It looks like all the non magical
classes got all the cool toys, and we are left to the dogs.

Also, ask them to implement more varied spell animation. It's laughable
when both lighting bolt and fire bolt look the same. And Shock of
lightning looks red. Come on, it's really hard to get in to the game
with such lame repeating effects.

Please don't overlook this, because if looks really didn't matter, why
are we playing a 3D MUD, when we could play a regular one?

--
Sergey
--
KPS PUNK (Paramilitary Undercover Nuclear Kamikaze)
